attributes.additional_details: I am against abortion because i think to many people are just getting pregnant and getting an abortion there not thinking about the baby inside it might not of grown to be a child yet but it still has feelings i think people should think it through properly before deciding abortion is there only option, im not saying abortion is completely wrong because obviously there might be things wrong why you shouldnt keep the child but some people just get an abortion because they dont want the baby, people need to be more careful and think about the pain the baby is going to go through. I think you should only be allowed to have an abortion if you got sexually assaulted, under the age of 18, you have an illness that might harm the baby.
